title: Riot support plz anwser
body: My account was hacked Sunday on the 7th and I made a ticket immediately after i found this out by the missing 3k+ Rp i had on my account was stolen and was used to buy one of his friends spirit udyr skin. I know this because off the store purchase history and the missing refund token that was used to bump up the Rp on my account to afford the skin he also purchased a icon with my rp points as well since i only had the default summoner icons except for the new project event that happened recently and the golden draven when there was the draven event . I know there is a queue for tickets but i would like to know if anything is happening since the status of my ticket has been open for the past 3 days. And if i could get a refund on  this skin and get my king of club mordekaiser skin back as well. i mentioned this in the ticket. Also to further prove that it was not me playing if u look at all my match history except for the day of my account being hacked i have always played with 4 different friends 100% of the time. except for 2 games where i solo que  renekton blind pick other than that i never play without these guys.  also one of my friends recently got back on league so i have played co-op bot games with him but other than that these 4 people i always play with.  ticket number is (22792666) i would just like a response on the matter or just let me know that you guys are at least their listening. otherwise feels really bad{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Our account specialists will get back to you as soon as they can. Response times can range depending on how many tickets are in that team's queue. I suggest continuing to be patient while someone gets back to you. Avoid "bumping" your ticket, as it actually puts your ticket in the back of the queue and lengthens the time it takes for someone to reach back out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
i love you guys thank you so much targon and the rest of riot employees for solving my problem{{item:3026}}  right there
